movies.name: DRISHYAM
movies.Synopsis: A happy family living in a hilly area is confronted with a sudden twist of fate and their decision to take it on results in a struggle that is both painful and engaging.

reviews.head: This 'Drishyam' is an excellent watch
reviews.comments: This 'Drishyam' is undoubtedly cladded with exceptional story telling combined with bravura rector Jeethu Joseph is receiving a standing ovation for his fine execution of a well written material from a very simple plot. An undoubtedly exceptional film as far the content is concer.Jeethu Joseph is receiving a standing ovation for his fine execution of a well written material from a very simple plot. An undoubtedly exceptional film as far the content

reviews.head: Sprinkles glitter on the megastar.
reviews.comments: Keeping with the circumstances, the mother and daughters change the color of their respective skins. Kalabhavan Shajon too, in the role of the bad guy, a cop, puts up a striking performance. But the limelight belongs entirely to Mohanlal. Like the versatile greats of Hollywood, this actor possesse the mother and daughters change the color of their respective skins. Kalabhavan Shajon too, in the role of the bad guy, a cop, puts up a striking performance. But the limelight belongs entirely to Mohanlal. Like the versatile

movies.name: USTHAD HOTEL
movies.Synopsis: An urbane chef from a well-to-do family with very high ambitions goes on to find approval from his conservative father, true love and the real purpose of his life.

movies.name: UNDA
movies.Synopsis: During a volatile election season, a group of policemen led by Sub Inspector Mani strive to maintain law and order in a Naxalite stronghold. Unda stars Mammootty in the lead role.

movies.name: ROMANCHAM
movies.Synopsis: Romancham is a story based on real incidents that happened in the life of 7 bachelors in Bangalore in 2007 after playing the Ouija board and events followed by it.

movies.name: JO AND JO

movies.name: UYARE

movies.name: VIRUS
